Introduction

Increase efficiency by saving data in memory so that the computers do not need to load data again every time.

Why?

focus on why we need it

How?

stop redis

$ killall redis-server

start redis

$ redis-server

connect to redis

$ redis-cli

check the number of keys

After connect to redis

> DBSIZE

Check whether a data cached

  1. remove all cache
> redis-cli FLUSHALL

  1. do some steps on your webpage for caching in redis

  2. start to monitor

> redis-cli MONITOR
  1. check the keys of cached data
> keys *

What?

give an example

Reference

How can I test if my redis cache is working?
